settings.name: Maximum roosting speed
settings.description: Insert maximum speed that your roosting animal can have (in m/s)

settings.name: Minimum roost duration
settings.description: Insert minimum duration (in h) that your animal has to be in a refined area to be considered roosting. If roost radius is given, default here to 1 hour.

settings.name: Maximum roost radius
settings.description: Insert maximum radius (in m) of an area within which your animal must remain to be considered roosting behavior. If roost duration is given, default here to 1000 m (= 1 km)

references.note: Kölzsch A. 2021. A paper about my map. Fireworks effect goose roosting behaviour. in preparation
